#Bootstrap---------------------------------------------------------
rsq <- function(formula, data, indices) {
  d <- data[indices,] # allows boot to select sample 
  fit <- lm(formula, data=d)
  return(summary(fit)$r.square)
} 
results <- boot(data=regression_afinn_dow_jones_kursabschluss, statistic=rsq,
  	R=1000, formula=Abschlusskurs~ Sentiment1+Sentiment2 + Sentiment3+ Sentiment4+Sentiment5+ Sentiment6)
results
